name: Game: RogueLike Weapon System + Controller
description:
CONTROLLER REQUIRED Controls:

Left Joystick: Player Movement.

Right Joystick: Weapon Aim.

"RB" Button: Fire Weapon.

"A" Button: Dash.

"X" Button: Reload Weapon.

Right Cross Button: Change Weapon (if player holds 2).

Features:

- 4 different sample weapons (different damage, cadence, ammo, fire mode, bullet dispersion...): Pistol, Gatling, Laser and  Sniper (hold 3 sec to shoot).

- Multiple weapon hold (primary (pistol), and secondary (on pick)).

-Dash: speed boost + invulnerability frames.

- Weapon class generator.

- Controller Input System.

- Enemy melee-range aim "AI".

- 2D player Sprite System based on player movement/aim.

by: Quim Colobrans Ramírez
